messages.subject: Ned, censorship, manners
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/8/03 7:25:30 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/8/03 7:25:30 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
No, I'll probably unsubscribe. I guess I'm just spoiled by that silly little
so-called right called "Freedom of Speech." >>

OK, do you even know what Freedom of Speech means?
If Ned was actually censored, as you claim, he wouldn't be able to talk about
his ideas at all. In fact, he might face imprisonment for doing so.
You seem to not understand what censorship or freedom of speech mean at all.

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
